content:
path /v3/data/blocks/latest
operationId GetLatestBlock
parameters
description The blockchain to work with
in query
name chain
required True
schema
ChainEnum
type string
summary Get latest block
description 1 credit per API call
Get information about latest added block on the following blockchains

Celo  celo / celotestnet
Ethereum  ethereum / ethereumsepolia
BNB Binance Smart Chain  bsc / bsctestnet
Polygon  polygon / polygonmumbai

To get started you can just provide a chain
responses
200
schema
BlockItem
type object
properties
blockNumber
type integer
description The block number in the blockchain
blockTimestamp
type integer
format int64
description The timestamp when the block was created in milliseconds since Unix epoch
hash
type string
description The hash of the block
eventIngestedSize
type integer
description The number of ingested events in the block
nftIngestedSize
type integer
description The number of ingested NFTs in the block
txHashes
type string
description The array of transaction hashes included in the block
description Latest block added to a blockchain
description OK
